Name: Santiago #2
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker.
Review: Lemon fresh pomegranate sweetened with agave nectar and laced with light rum.
History: Created in 2008 by Simon Rowe at The Bar at The Dorchester Hotel, London, England.
